# NEVPNConnectionError.serverCertificateExpired

**Case**

An error code that indicates the server certfiicate’s validity period has passed.

## Declaration

```swift
case serverCertificateExpired
```

## Server certificate error codes

- **NEVPNConnectionError.serverCertificateInvalid**: An error code that indicates the server certfiicate is invalid.
- **NEVPNConnectionError.serverCertificateNotYetValid**: An error code that indicates the server certfiicate won’t be valid until some time in the future.
